Name: Throttle CSS animation speed
Description: Can I throttle CSS animation playback speed?
Author: @pankajparashar

Notes: 1. Inspect the element with CSS `animation` property applied.
2. Open the **Command Menu** (`Cmd+Shift+P` or `Ctrl+Shift+P`) > Run "Show Animations (Drawer)".
3. Use the buttons (**100%, 25%, 10%**) to throttle the playback speed of the CSS animation live.
